# PMS "default" Theme

## default

Very basic theme, no bells or whistles

## Suggested Plugins

This plugin will pair well with these plugins

* [Plugin 1](https://github.com/JoshuaEstes/pms/blob/main/pms/README.md)
* [Plugin 2](https://github.com/JoshuaEstes/pms/blob/main/pms/README.md)
